name: essential-airlines
description:
TAKE TO THE SKIES!

ONLY YOU CAN FEED THE HUNGRY CITIZENS OF THE FLEET.

YOU  ARE  A  PILOT  FOR  ESSENTIAL  AIRLINES.
YOUR  WORK  FEEDS  THE  FLOATING  CITY.

PICK  UP  FOOD  FROM  RESTAURANTS.
DELIVER  THEM  TO  HUNGRY  HOUSES.

CONTROLS:
WASD  -  CONTROL  PITCH/YAW
Q/E  -  CONTROL  ROLL
SHIFT  -  GO  FASTER
CTRL  -  GO  SLOWER
SPACEBAR  -  TOGGLE  DELIVERY  MODE
MOUSE  -  [IN  DELIVERY  MODE]  AIM
LEFT  CLICK  -  [IN  DELIVERY  MODE]  FIRE
ESC  -  PAUSE
